The heavy-duty metal clamp with anti-slip pads grips desks up to 2.75" thick, holding securely without wobble or surface damage. Perfect for home offices, workbenches, and architect tables.

What You Get & Warranty: 42" Desk Lamp, 27.7" Adjustable Arm, Heavy-Duty Metal Clamp, 24W Power Adapter, Wireless Remote, Screw Set & Screwdriver, and User Manual.
